pages.md:
# Connections

| Problem                                                                 | Solution                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **The monitor is blank.**                                               | The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor (ðŸ“– 282).                                                                                         |
| **Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.**                           | **EVF ONLY** + !Sensor Icon is selected for **VIEW MODE SETTING**: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different **VIEW MODE SETTING** option (ðŸ“– 14).                        |
| **No picture or sound on TV.**                                          | - The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (ðŸ“– 282).                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                         | - Input on the television is set to â€œTVâ€: Set input to â€œHDMIâ€ (ðŸ“– 282).                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                         | - The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (ðŸ“– 282).                                                                                                     |
| **The computer does not recognize the camera.**                         | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (ðŸ“– 287).                                                                                                                                        |
| **FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.** | Check the option selected for **CONNECTION MODE** on the camera. Select **USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE** before connecting the USB cable (ðŸ“– 291).                                                        |
| **Cannot connect to iPhones or iPads.**                                 | **ON** is selected for **USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING**. Select **OFF** when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that does not supply power (ðŸ“– 241).                              |
| **Cannot connect to smartphone.**                                       | Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connector with which the smartphone is equipped (ðŸ“– 292).                                 |

> ðŸ“˜ **Technical Notes**  
> Page 321

rows: The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor (ðŸ“– 282).
**Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.**
**EVF ONLY** + !Sensor Icon is selected for **VIEW MODE SETTING**: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different **VIEW MODE SETTING** option (ðŸ“– 14).
- The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (ðŸ“– 282).
- Input on the television is set to â€œTVâ€: Set input to â€œHDMIâ€ (ðŸ“– 282).
- The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (ðŸ“– 282).
**The computer does not recognize the camera.**
Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (ðŸ“– 287).
**FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.**
Check the option selected for **CONNECTION MODE** on the camera. Select **USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE** before connecting the USB cable (ðŸ“– 291).
**ON** is selected for **USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING**. Select **OFF** when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that does not supply power (ðŸ“– 241).
Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connector with which the smartphone is equipped (ðŸ“– 292).
